text: Lugovaya () is a rural locality (a village) in Beloozersky Selsoviet, Gafuriysky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 126 as of 2010. There are 4 streets. == Geography == It is located 30 km from Krasnousolsky, 6 km from Beloye Ozero. == References == Category:Rural localities in Gafuriysky District
title: Lugovaya, Gafuriysky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
